title: Why do so many people use umbrellas to avoid getting wet in the rain, when umbrella are so relatively ineffective at keeping us dry? - Quora

response.answer_text: They are easy to carry.They are easy to use.They prevent us from getting drenched in a drizzle and slight rain.They prevent us from getting suntanned.The umbrellas which are not folded and which the elderly use may be used to drive away stay dogs if the latter try to scare them.In short, given its size and weight , they are very useful to the people who use them.

$1 throwaway umbrellas are pretty ineffective. Good umbrellas can last for years and keep you, or at least what you are carrying, dry. They also work as sunshades and a pretty effective sound focusing device at outdoor events. Yes, some partygoers at Talladega in the infield laughed at me, but what I was smoking stayed dry.
